name: Boss Blitz
description:
Play as Dax as he defeats robots and bosses to fight his way back to the past! Ther are two bosses and some standard bad guy robots! This Game was made by FalcoDJ and InternetBowser for the olcCodeJame 2021 using the Godot Engine.

Asset creators:

  1. Heartbeast: Walls, Bats, Sounds, and Death effects
  2. Graph Script Dev : Trees
  3. InternetBowser and FalcoDJ: Boss, and Player
  4. heroiclabs: most music
  5. Viktor Hahn: terrain tiles
  6. ArtStation: robot sprites
